title: Point charge at center of metal box

content.prompt: The point charge Q shown above is at the center of a metal box that is isolated, ungrounded, and uncharged. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: The net charge on the outside surface of the box is Q.
The potential inside the box is zero.
The electric field inside the box is constant.
The electric field outside the box is zero everywhere.
The electric field outside the box is the same as if only the point charge (and not the box) were there.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
